section.title: Customizing Hosts with Tags
section.para: You can use tags to store information about your hosts. You can then search for hosts based on tags.

step.para: Use the Hosts resource tab, tree mode, or the search function to find and select the host in the results list.
Click Assign Tags to open the Assign Tags window.
The Assign Tags window lists all available tags. Select the check boxes of applicable tags.
Click OK to assign the tags and close the window.

section.para: You have added extra, searchable information about your host as tags.
